Description: Two fragments from the body of a light-brown pottery oil-jar, interior grooved and exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip, with remains of four lines of black-painted hieratic text on the exterior, specifying contents as year 11 oil of the Aten domain from the archery commander Hat.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389875) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389875)
